examples: The pain was almost more than he could bear.
El dolor era casi más de lo que podía soportar.
She bore it all with her usual patience.
Lo soportó todo con su paciencia habitual.
She couldn't bear the thought of losing him.
No podía soportar la idea de perderlo.
I can't bear having cats in the house.
No soporto tener gatos en casa.
